    #include<cstdio>
    #include<list>
    #include<queue>
    using namespace std;
    struct graph 
    {
    	int v;
    	list <int> *adj;
    };
    int main()
    {
    	int a,b,c,d,e,f;
    	scanf("%d%d", &a, &b );
    	struct graph g;
    	 g.adj=new list<int>[a+1];
    	for(c=0;c<b;c++)
    	{
    		scanf("%d%d", &d, &e );
    		g.adj[d].push_back(e);
    	}
        int visited[a+1];
        for(c=0;c<(a+1);c++)
        {
        	visited[c]=0;
        }
        int p;
        f=0;
        list<int>::iterator i;
        queue <int> q;
        q.push(1);
        int count=0;
        while(!q.empty())
        { 
        	p=q.front();
        	q.pop();
        	visited[p]=1;
            for(i=g.adj[p].begin();i!=g.adj[p].end();i++)
            {
            	if(visited[*i]==1)
            	{
            		f=1;break;
            	}
            	else
            	{
            		q.push(*i);
            	}
            }
          if(f==1)
          {
          	break;
          }
    count++;
        }
        if(count==a)
        {
        	printf("YES\n" );
        }
        else
        {
        	if(f==1)
        	{
        		printf("NO\n" );
        	}
        	else
        	{
        		printf("NO\n" );
        	}
        }
        return 0;
    }
